review: I don't use it that much but it works fine and is fun to play with. For the price it's good to have.
author: Diana C.

review: Excellent just what I needed and the best price.
author: Alicia Subero Cordero

review: I love this. I bought two. Got rid of the annoying HDMI cables that used to connect my laptop the TV.
author: Prabo Wijetunge

review: I wish it had more features, but overall it was a  descent buy!
author: gerardo hernandez

review: I love this little guy, I know have them on 3 of my home TV's (no cable or sat) I have also set up 2 at my parents. I just wish CBS would make a better app. But thats not the fault of the Chromecast.
author: I. Sterne "I"

review: It works fine, but I was expecting a little more from it.It is great for sending videos from the phone, iPad or computer to the TV, but I expected it to be able to receive information as well, like share screens or present ppts.So, it works great for what it is made for, but it could have been made for a couple of more things.
author: Jose
